@LeonLinsay getting into Europe is what it's all about. We have given ourselves the best long term chance of achieving that.
@LeonLinsay no, it's the long term. Next year we have 4 chances, you have 1. That's why winning the championship means more.
@LeonLinsay you are focusing too much on the short term. Playing in the top national league is far better long term. Wee team mentality.
@LeonLinsay its not about who is better, it's about achievement for that season. If that happens, Hibs had a more successful year.
@LeonLinsay thats correct. The promotion to the top league is of higher importance than the Scottish Cup.
